title.rendered: The Falanx Cyber N-able Partner Programme

content.rendered:
[vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1614066274893{padding-top: 200px !important;padding-bottom: 300px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Partner-Solarwind.png?id=13486) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-xs” responsive_css=”padding_top_large:200px|padding_bottom_large:300px|padding_top_medium:150px|padding_bottom_medium:150px|padding_top_small:150px|padding_bottom_small:150px”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

The Falanx Cyber

N-able Partner

Programme

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”right top” css=”.vc_custom_1614084907258{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 90px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Mobile-SW.png?id=13507) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_init_translate_x=”1″ ca_init_translate_y=”-53″ ca_delay=”300″ row_hide=”hidden-sm hidden-md hidden-lg”][vc_column width=”1/2″ css=”.vc_custom_1601028359878{padding-right: 80px !important;}”]

The Falanx Cyber

N-able Partner

Programme

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ align=”text-center”] Get in touch [vc_empty_space][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”middle” enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ bg_position=”center center” css=”.vc_custom_1600872144566{padding-top: 90px !important;padding-bottom: 70px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Become-a-partner-2.jpg?id=11158) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″ el_id=”detect-information-section”][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”1″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ align=”text-center” offset=”vc_col-md-offset-0 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-xs” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”31″][/vc_column][vc_column enable_content_animation=”yes” ca_init_scale_x=”1″ ca_init_scale_y=”1″ ca_init_scale_z=”1″ ca_init_opacity=”0″ ca_an_scale_x=”1″ ca_an_scale_y=”1″ ca_an_scale_z=”1″ ca_an_opacity=”1″ offset=”vc_col-lg-offset-0 vc_col-md-offset-6 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ responsive_css=”margin_left_large:15%25|padding_left_large:7%25|margin_left_medium:15%25|padding_right_medium:7%25|padding_left_medium:7%25″ ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ ca_init_translate_y=”30″ css=”.vc_custom_1600433156945{padding-top: 3% !important;padding-right: 3% !important;padding-bottom: 3% !important;padding-left: 3% !important;background-color: rgba(255,255,255,0.82) !important;*background-color: rgb(255,255,255) !important;}”]

Are you a N-able partner?

[vc_column_text]If you are, you probably know that Falanx Cyber and N-able have been partnered for around 3 years now. We have been supporting them in their TMSP™ Program as the UK-based SOC supporting their Threat Monitor™ platform.

In addition, we have always offered our Security Operations Centre (SOC) services based upon our own technology platform. This technology stack continues to evolve and embrace current market offerings under the service brand of Triarii.

We are pleased to say that N-able has accepted our Triarii service into their Technology Alliance Partner (TAP) Program as an alternative offering to Threat Monitor™ – wherein they recommend key strategic partners to their community of N-able MSP Partners. The TAP Program membership includes our Triarii platforms (including both Triarii and Triarii for Sentinel – our Microsoft Azure version) as well as all of our professional services such as Penetration Testing, Security Assessments, Awareness Training and more.[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613481846549{padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Programme Overview

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Benefits Include:

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613481846549{padding-top: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]The Falanx Cyber N-able Partner Programme is focussed upon empowering your success while growing our mutually beneficial relationship. The programme is designed to support your business model and presents resources, benefits, growth and expansion opportunities for -MSP’s reselling our cyber-security services and solutions.

[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_single_image image=”13475″ img_size=”large”][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″]

Deal Registration for Opportunity Security

Dedicated Account Managers

Low Barrier to Entry

Technical & Field Sales Support

Joint Marketing Opportunities

Use of Partner Logos

Recurring Revenue Opportunities

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613480789963{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column]

Our Partnership Begins Here

[vc_column_text]The purpose of the Falanx Cyber N-able Partner Programme is to enable exceptional growth and profitability for our partners, achieved through our superior, market-leading, cyber-security services and solutions. Falanx Cyber gives you the resources needed to enhance your reputation, grow your business, differentiate from your competitors, increase client satisfaction, and maximize revenues.[/vc_column_text]
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613482091822{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”15px”]

Expand Your Cyber Services Portfolio

[vc_empty_space height=”15px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613481862010{padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #122135 !important;}” el_class=”o2c-white-text”][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Test

[vc_column_text]CREST-certified Penetration Testing

Ethical Phishing 

Red Teaming[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600942751170{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Detect & Respond

[vc_column_text]Triarii – Managed Detection & Response Services

Managed Endpoint Detection & Response Service

Incident Response Services[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″ responsive_css=”margin_top_large:0px|margin_top_medium:0px|margin_top_small:0px” css=”.vc_custom_1600942763324{margin-top: -20px !important;}”]

Advise

[vc_column_text]Awareness Training 

Cyber Essentials & Cyber Essentials PLUS 

Threat & Risk Assessments

Cyber Advice & Guidance[/vc_column_text]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613576296781{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column]

Become a Falanx Cyber N-able Partner Today

[vc_column_text]We’re dedicated to the MSP vendor/partner dynamic and we offer a variety of features to deliver value to our partners every step of the way.[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title=”Contact Us” style=”custom” custom_background=”#122135″ custom_text=”#ffffff” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Ffalanxcyber.com%2Fcontact%2F|title:Contact||”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1613576296781{padding-top: 60px !important;}”][vc_column][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/551900884″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row parallax=”enable_parallax” enable_content_animation=”yes” animation_preset=”Fade In Right” enable_overlay=”yes” css=”.vc_custom_1601387813596{padding-top: 100px !important;padding-bottom: 140px !important;background-image: url(https://falanxcyber.com/wp-content/uploads/Testimonials-V2.jpg?id=12953) !important;background-position: center;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}” ca_duration=”1600″ ca_delay=”160″ el_id=”testimonials-MDR” row_hide=”hidden-xs”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-4″]

Testimonials

[/vc_column][vc_column offset=”vc_col-md-offset-3 vc_col-md-9″]

“I have been very impressed by the high standard of Falanx’s communication, testing procedures and reporting. From the initial engagement through to test reports and follow up advice, they have provided exceptional service and I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend them; we will certainly be using them again for future testing.”

Claudia Zimmer
Operations Manager, Ensign Pensions

“The team at Falanx have been great, from an initial enquiry to completing the test has been seamless. Our account manager and the rest of the team have been incredibly reactive in responding to our queries and the work performed has been great. I would not hesitate to recommend Falanx for your IT Security needs.”

Mitchell Smith
Product Manager, One Site Global Ltd

“We have worked with Falanx Cyber for several years and have always been impressed with the professional service they provide. This begins with the early stages of planning, providing useful advice on which areas to focus testing on, including any specific details around emerging threats. This continues with the execution of the agreed pen tests and vulnerability assessments where we are kept informed throughout the whole process, and finally with the informative reports produced and any assistance required following any remediation efforts.”

James Myhill
Head of IT, Canal and River Trust

“Falanx provided us with a phishing campaign that delivered a invaluable insight into how our staff reacted to potentially dangerous phishing attempts. The Phishing results were very  enlightening and will help shape our internal cyber security awareness program. We were very pleased with the design and execution of the campaign and we will continue to use Falanx for further phishing campaigns to prove the effectiveness of our cyber security training”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“Falanx conducted in-person training session that made employees engage, participate, and ask questions. Rob the trainer showed us that human recognition is one of the most important lines of defence against phishing and cyber security attacks. We especially enjoyed Rob’s stories of social engineering and made all employees sit up and think how important all aspects of cyber security not just attacks via conventional means.”

Tony Donn
Head of IT, Cenkos

“We see great value in investing in positive reinforcement of staff, especially in delivering awareness training. Due to COVID-19 on site training was not possible but Falanx were able to step in and provide their usual high quality cyber security training over web.”

Cyber Security Manager
Leading Specialist Bank
[/vc_column][/vc_row]
